metadata.description: Powerful AI assistants for Rails, iOS Swift, and Android Kotlin. 7 focused skills that help you work faster while you stay in control. Tools, not automation. Bilingual English/French.

plugins.name: workflow-skills
plugins.description: 7 developer-controlled skills: generate-prd (adaptive modes), implement-code (guided workflow), implement-tests, track-prd-progress, commit (message generator), create-pr (description generator), code-review (branch diff analysis). No auto-invocations - you orchestrate the workflow.
